string.text: Nemiroff 보드카

Nemiroff is a Ukrainian producer of alcoholic beverages, specialising in vodkas and other spirits, based in the town of Nemyriv in the Vinnytska oblast. One of the best vodkas in the world and - by extension - in the Zone.
 
 %c[ui_gray_3]NOTE:
 
 %c[ui_gray_1]It is commonly known that this brand of alcohol is preferred by the Ecologist's chef at Yantar. Rumours exist that he'll happily smuggle military gear into the hands of common stalkers in exchange for a few swigs from a bottle, but such stories have yet to be substantiated.
 
 %c[ui_gray_3]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] drink
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] stimulant
 %c[d_red] • %c[ui_gray_2] strong alcohol
Putinka vodka

Following the tradition of naming vodka brands after Russian leaders, Putinka first went into production after Vladimir Putin was elected president. Produced in Russia from the finest grain and crystal clear water from Siberian springs. Triple purification, smooth texture, unique taste are not the only characteristics of this beverage. Drink with moderation.
 
 %c[ui_gray_3]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] drink
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] stimulant
 %c[d_red] • %c[ui_gray_2] strong alcohol
Stolichnaya vodka

A favourite amongst Russians and many people the world over. A Russian vodka of high quality. Highly popular in the Zone and widely available most probably owing to an outside connection of one of the traders. In order to avoid detection by the military units stationing around the Zone, it is usually shipped in army containers or metal barrels, and then distributed in sturdy metal bottles.
 
 %c[ui_gray_3]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] stimulant
 %c[d_red] • %c[ui_gray_2] strong alcohol
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] high quality
Ukrainian beer

Ukrainian beer. Another - beside vodka - popular beverage in the Zone.
 
 %c[ui_gray_3]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] drink
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] imported
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] stimulant
 %c[d_red] • %c[ui_gray_2] light alcohol
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] clean nutrition source
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] high quality
철제 병

존에서 생산한 보드카로 보이는 것이 들어 있는 철제 병입니다. 냄새가 강하지 않지만, 가스가 차있습니다.
 
 %c[ui_gray_3]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] stimulant
 %c[d_red] • %c[ui_gray_2] strong, low quality alcohol
에너지 드링크

피곤할 때, 지치지 않게 해주는 효과로 인해 스토커가 장시간 여행을 할 때 자주 사용합니다. 또한 이 드링크는 당신이 술 취했을 때 당신을 약간 깨게해줄 뿐만 아니라 혈관에 아드레날린의 방출을 유도합니다. 과다복용을 금지합니다.
 
 %c[ui_gray_3]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] drink
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] imported
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] stimulant
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] potent alcohol sobering effect
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] clean nutrition source
정수된 물

군용 플라스크는 소량의 물을 저장하기 위한 것입니다. 의료진과 과학자에 의해 쓰입니다. 첫째로, 물- 특별한 종류의 알코올과 넣어서-을 매우 높은 온도에서 끓여 정수와 소독을 합니다. 그 후, 그것을 매우 차가운 냉장고에서 식힙니다. 마지막 결과는 완전히 방사능이 없는 물입니다. 위와 같은 사항에도 불구하고 순도에 대한 의구심이 여전히 남아 있다면 언제든지 akvatab를 사용할 수 있습니다. 생산가격 때문에 군용 플라스크는 공급이 제한되어 있고, 적당한 가격에 판매됩니다. 의료진도 재고가 있지만, 운송비가 포함되어 있어 가격이 조금 더 비쌉니다.
 
 %c[ui_gray_3]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] drink
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] clean nutrition source
오래된 고깃덩어리

오래된 빵 한 덩이와 정체불명의 냄새 나는 고기가 갈색 종이로 싸여 있습니다. 모양과 냄새로 보아 일부가 곰팡이가 피었음을 알 수 있습니다.
 
 %c[ui_gray_3]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_red] • %c[ui_gray_2] low quality
Beard(비어드)의 차

Beard(비어드)가 만든 유명하고 뜨거운 차는 설탕, 식용 건조 버섯, 그리고 방사능이 없는 끓인 물로 만들어 집니다. 이 차를 살 여유가 있는 스토커들은 종종 존에서 장거리 여행을 위해 이것을 가져갑니다. 피곤할 때나 추운 밤에 탐험할 때 건강에 좋습니다.
 
 %c[ui_gray_3]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] drink
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] potent alcohol sobering effect
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] clean nutrition source
토마토 통조림

잘게 잘라지고 다져진 토마토가 통조림되어 존으로 수입됩니다. 유통기한 전까지 신선하다고 알려져 있습니다.
 
 %c[ui_gray_3]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] food
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] imported
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] clean nutrition source
훈제 소세지

쇠고기와 돼지고기로 만들어졌습니다. 훈제 및 진공 포장으로 장기간 보존이 가능합니다. 이 특별한 제품은 러시아 연방에서 수입된 것입니다. 뛰어난 맛과 향으로 러시아 마피아 두목들 사이에서 유명합니다.
 
 %c[ui_gray_3]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] food
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] imported
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] clean nutrition source
옥수수 통조림

외부에서 들여온 옥수수통조림입니다. 그대로 먹을 수 있지만, 수프 재료로 사용하는 사람도 있습니다.
 
 %c[ui_gray_3]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] food
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] imported
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] clean nutrition source
베이크드 빈스

(부대찌개에 들어가는 '그 콩' 통조림) 서쪽에서 가져온 강낭콩 통조림입니다. 토마토 소스 속의 강낭콩은 몇몇 사람들에게 좋은 추억을 가져다 줄지도 모릅니다.
 
 %c[ui_gray_3]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] food
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] imported
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] clean nutrition source
칠리 빈스

서양에서 수입된 칠리소스 콩 통조림입니다. 존에서 일부 요리 재료로 인기 있습니다.
 
 %c[ui_gray_3]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] food
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] imported
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] clean nutrition source
참치 통조림

깡통 뒤의 유통기한 전까지 가장 좋으며, 맛을 기대하지 마십시오.
 
 %c[ui_gray_3]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] food
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] imported
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] clean nutrition source
"아바칸" 고기 투숀카

투숀카(Tushonka)는 소비에트 연방과 다른 바르샤바 조약국들에서 생산되는 통조림, 스튜의 통칭입니다. 아이러니한 것은 이 아이디어가 원래 2차 세계대전의 원조 수송수단의 형태로 미국에서 러시아로 왔다는 것입니다. 그 이후, 다양한 종류의 투숀카가 오랜 기간 동안 육류를 보존하는 주요 수단이 되었으며, 이는 민간인들이 사용하는 것과 표준 문제인 붉은 군대의 식량 배급으로 사용되었습니다. 긴 유효기간에도 불구하고 투숀카는 높은 영양가(대부분 지방 함량이 높기 때문)와 비교적 좋은 맛으로 알려져 있습니다. 체르노빌 출입 금지 구역에는 수백 가지 종류와을 맛을 지닌 투숀카들이 보여져왔습니다. 2013년 봄, '아바칸' 분쇄육 브랜드는 의심의 여지가 없는 왕으로 남아있습니다. 그리고 존은 확실히 그것보다 더 나쁜 것을 보았습니다.
 
 %c[ui_gray_3]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] food
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] imported
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] clean nutrition source
Smoked salmon

Ukrainian smoked salmon. As soon as it's brought to the Zone, the fish changes hands until it finds its way to the highest bidder. Very valuable.
 
 %c[ui_gray_3]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] food
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] imported
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] high quality
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] clean nutrition source
Raisins

A pack of raisins. Rich in nutrients, balances sugar in the blood.
 
 %c[ui_gray_3]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] food
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] imported
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] clean nutrition source
Russian chocolate

Russian chocolate. Very rare in the Zone and quite valuable even though its taste is nothing special. Brings back many fond childhood memories, which may help soothe the pain of living in the harsh and unforgiving conditions of the Zone.
 
 %c[ui_gray_3]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] food
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] imported
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] high quality
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] valuable
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] clean nutrition source
Russian chocolate (half-consumed)

Russian chocolate. Very rare in the Zone and quite valuable even though its taste is nothing special. Brings back many fond childhood memories, which may help soothe the pain of living in the harsh and unforgiving conditions of the Zone.
 
 %c[ui_gray_3]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] food
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] imported
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] high quality
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] valuable
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] clean nutrition source
Altoids

Mint-flavoured altoids imported from the West. They are highly refreshing and remove radiation particles from the mouth. They also seem to reduce sleepiness for a short while. You can take as many as 10 mints at a time but that's only because your mouth isn't able to fit any more.
 
 %c[ui_gray_3]PROPERTIES:
Mixed nuts

Assorted peanuts, hazelnuts, cashews and almonds in a nice and popular blend. Nutrition value is quite high. Imported from South Africa.
 
 %c[ui_gray_3]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] food
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] imported
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] high quality
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] clean nutrition source
Mineral water

Mineral water from Ukrainian springs. Carbonated and with additional calcium.
 
 %c[ui_gray_3]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] drink
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] high quality
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] mild alcohol sobering effect
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] clean nutrition source
MRE

The Meal, Ready-to-Eat (commonly known as the MRE) is a self-contained, individual field ration in lightweight packaging, developed by the United States military for its service members for use in combat or other field conditions where organised food facilities are not available. One MRE can be used as one meal. The packaging of an MRE is designed to withstand rough conditions and exposure to the elements. Contains one course along with a variety of other food and drink items. While it can be eaten cold, it usually tastes much better when heated up with the included flameless ration heater (FRH, a water-activated exothermic reaction device that emits heat).
 
 %c[ui_gray_3]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] military ration

 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] high quality
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] clean nutrition source
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] 3 portions in one package. 1398 kcal in total
Russian IRP-B combat ration

Breakfast, dinner and supper all in one package. Includes various food items whose function is to provide the body with all minerals and microelements essential for your health as well as cooking equipment (small metal frame, fuel tablets, matches, striker) and other items (e.g. napkins) facilitating use in field conditions. Comes with a polymeric box that protects the ingredients from hazardous environmental conditions. The polymeric box has 3 sections, each respectively for breakfast, dinner and supper.
 
 %c[ui_gray_3]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] military ration
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] clean nutrition source
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] 7 portions in one package. 3661 kcal in total
Ukrainian combat ration

This Ukrainian combat ration is based on a previous Russian version, and comprises commercially available cans and dried food items packed together in a sectioned box (resembling a takeout tray) made of very thin green plastic. Contains all that is necessary to provide a healthy adult with all calories and minerals needed during a single day.
 
 %c[ui_gray_3]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] military ration
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] clean nutrition source
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] 6 portions in one package. 3186 kcal in total
Bread loaf

A fine bread loaf baked by Nimble's wife living outside the Zone. It was the first commodity Nimble started to sell before his business expanded. Nowadays, he provides barkeepers with this fine bread, acting as an intermediary. After all, he has more pressing matters to attend to as he has his own company to manage.
 
 %c[ui_gray_3]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] food
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] imported
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] clean nutrition source
Breadcrumbs

Crumbs of bread baked in the Great Land.
 
 %c[ui_gray_3]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] food
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] imported
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] clean nutrition source
Chocolate protein bar

This bar provides the body with necessary proteins and sugars which give you a welcome boost. Useful on longer trips when you're on the go and need to eat something fast.
 
 %c[ui_gray_3]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] food
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] imported
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] clean nutrition source
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] high quality
Sparkling water

Sparkling water for thirsty stalkers. It has some exhilarating effect when you're tired.
 
 %c[ui_gray_3]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] drink
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] imported
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] mild alcohol sobering effect
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] clean nutrition source
"The Beak"

"The Beak" is a powerful mixture of Zone-produced vodka and pulverised beak of a black crow. Not every beak can be used as an ingredient, because only black male crows that have lived in the Zone for more than 15 years have mutated sufficiently. The rumour has it that such beaks contain a form of enriched protein that cleanses moderate amounts of radiation from the body. Some even say that drinking "the Beak" makes you feel like you have wings for a few seconds. On the downside, however, the taste itself is awful.\n
Cuban cigar

This valuable Cuban cigar can bring you bliss for a short while, especially when you're admiring a nice sunset. Some stalkers noticed that smoking strong tobacco repels mosquitoes. Cuban cigars are considered the finest in the world. A rare commodity.
 
 %c[ui_gray_3]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] stimulant
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] imported
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] high quality
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] valuable
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] potent alcohol sobering effect
Lucky Strike cigarettes

Cigarettes imported from the West. Some stalkers trade them for a few rounds of ammo within their faction.
 
 %c[ui_gray_3]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] stimulant
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] high quality
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] mild alcohol sobering effect
Russian brand of cigarettes

The cheapest pack of cigarettes in the Zone. Russian budget brand.
 
 %c[ui_gray_3]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] stimulant
 %c[d_red] • %c[ui_gray_2] low quality
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] mild alcohol sobering effect
Soviet cigarettes

A pack of budget, strong and very low quality cigarettes. Someone must have smoked most of them since there are only a few left. Genuine USSR flavour has been carefully preserved.
 
 %c[ui_gray_3]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] stimulant
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] mild alcohol sobering effect
Soviet cigarettes

A pack of budget, strong and very low quality cigarettes. Someone must have smoked most of them since there are only a few left. Genuine USSR flavour has been carefully preserved.
 
 %c[ui_gray_3]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] stimulant
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] mild alcohol sobering effect
Soviet cigarettes

A pack of budget, strong and very low quality cigarettes. Someone must have smoked most of them since there are only a few left. Genuine USSR flavour has been carefully preserved.
 
 %c[ui_gray_3]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] stimulant
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] mild alcohol sobering effect
Hand-rolling tobacco

Precious hand-rolling tobacco, imported from the West. With no additional ingredients, so it's possible to enjoy the original taste of tobacco leaf itself.
 
 %c[ui_gray_3]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] stimulant
 %c[d_red] • %c[ui_gray_2] slow usage (roll up)
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] potent alcohol sobering effect
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] high quality
Marlboro cigarettes

Cigarettes imported from the West. Someone must have smoked most of them since there are only a few left. Smoking just one may stabilise your mental state and satisfies hunger a bit. They are rare in the Zone and quite valuable.
 
 %c[ui_gray_3]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] stimulant
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] mild alcohol sobering effect
Russian tobacco

Cigarettes are expensive and rare in the Zone, and having raw tobacco enables you to produce your own cigs at a lower cost. This tin is sealed, which ensures that the tobacco will stay fresh for days or weeks depending on the conditions it's kept in.
 
 %c[ui_gray_3]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] stimulant
 %c[d_red] • %c[ui_gray_2] slow usage (roll up)
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] potent alcohol sobering effect
 %c[d_red] • %c[ui_gray_2] low quality
